value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG

value.title: What is the salary of a Power BI dev/ Data Analyst/ Data Engineer? | Salary calculator with Power BI
value.excerpt: Would you like to know if you are getting enough pay as a Power BI developer or data analysis or data engineer? Or are you thinking about changing jobs and would like to know which roles pay best?   To answer these questions I have partnered with Bright Data to get the raw data from the job listing sites:

First, I will explain When to use SUM and when to use SUMX. We will talk about the difference between SUM and SUMX functions

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. Then you can update those Power BI parameters once the report is published to the Power BI service.  PowerShell Samples:
